card.name: Allies in the East and South
card.graphics: Allies in the East and South.jpg
card.text: Playable if you are a Dúnadan-lord or Fallen-wizard with at least 6 P, and you have 2 unique hero factions playableat sites in The Sun-lands or Great Central Plains in play. Discard this card if these conditions are not met. You may tap a faction played at a site in one of the above named territories to reduce the hazard limit against one of your companies moving through such a territory by 1 (to a minimum of 2). Additionally, all influence attempts made by your opponents against such factions are modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated by a given player

card.name: Anborn of Ithilien
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Anborn. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. Anborn costs only 3 points of influence to control when in the company with Faramir, Damrod or Mablung. -1 to his CC if not in the company with one of these characters.

card.name: Ancient Druedain Wisdom
card.text: Playable on a Wose character with a mind of4 or more, if you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card from the company. Bearer may tap to make non-unique hoard items playable at Ruins and Lairs [R] with a Pûkel-creature automatic-attack.

card.name: Angbor
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against Men and Dúnedainplayable at sites in Gondor.

card.name: Argirion
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against Men. If Argirion becomes a leader: +1 to his prowess, body, mind and EI.

card.name: Banner of Elendil's House
card.text: Unique. Playable at Rivendell or Minas Tirith, if you have Arwen and Ring of Barahir in play. Discard if not borne by a Dúnadan. Each Dúnadan in bearer’s company requires 1 less influence to control (to a minimum of 1). May not be played by a Fallen-wizard player.

card.name: Beacon of Gondor
card.text: Dúnadan-lord specific. Playable on a Border-hold [B]or Free-hold [F] in Greater Gondor. Any warrior with a mind of 3 or less and a home site in Greater Gondor may be brought into play at this site. While your avatar is at this site: any warrior with a home site in Greater Gondor may be brought in to play, there is no restriction on the company composition, the site becomess a Battleground, and your characters may heal here. Discard this card when the site leaves active play.

card.name: Beacons Alight
card.text: All sites in Gondor receive an additional automatic-attack: Men — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against hero and covert companies). Additionally, each player may bring a Dúnadan hazard creature from his discard pile to his play deck (reshuffle) during the end-of-turn phase.

card.name: Bitter Heirlooms
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a Lord avatar. +1 to his P. +2 CP if played on a Dwarf-lord. He must make a roll during the organization phase if not at a Haven [H], modified by -4 if his P exceed 5, -6 if his P exceed 10, -8 if his P exceed 15, or -10 if his P exceed 20. If the result is 0 or less, he must move to a different site this turn. Cannot be duplicated on a given character. Discard during the organization phase if bearer is at a Haven [H].

card.name: Black Númenóreans
card.text: Manifestation of minion Black Númenóreans. Playable at a Dúnadan-hold Port in the Sun-lands or at Gobel Mirlond, if you discard from hand or from play The White Council or The Black Council and if the influence check is greater than 8.Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+2), each Black Númenóreans you have in play (+2).Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: Blood of Númenor
card.text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Playable on Lord Denethor if he has 12 or more P, and at least 2 Dúnadan factions and 2 stored Stolen Knowledge cards played at sites in Mordor in play. Discard if these conditions are not met. +1 to his body. tap: during the organization phase to bring a Dúnadan character with a mind less than 3 from your discard pile to your hand, or to modify an influence check made by a character in Gondor or by Denethor by +5.

card.name: Blood-stone Amulet
card.text: Jewel. May not be a starting item, unless your starting company includes a Wose character. May only be played after you successfully influence a Wose faction. +1 EI against Wose characters. tap: cancel a strike from a Pûkel-creature attack against bearer’s company.

card.name: Burned and Chopped-up
card.text: Minion player only. Playable on a company at Minas Tirith or at any site where The White Tree or Mallorn is in play. The company faces 3 attacks: Men — 5 strikes with 9 prowess; Men — 4 strikes with 10 prowess; Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 12 prowess; afterwards tap a warrior in the company or discard this card. Discard any Mallorn, The White Tree and/or Sapling of the White Tree in play at the site (stored or otherwise) to invert this card. If inverted, this card may be stored at a Darkhaven [K] for 5 mp.Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

attr.value: Hobbits faction is playable at this site; each Hobbit at this site bearing a battle-gear item gives +1 to the influence check. When Hobbits is played at this site, any Hobbit with a home site in The Shire may be brought into play at Bywater.
(1st) Hobbits — 5 strikes with 5 prowess; * (2nd) Dúnedain — 2 strikes with 11 prowess
*If the Hobbit faction is in play the 1st automatic-attack receives +2 prowess and +2 strikes and cannot be cancelled.
Men - 3 strikes at 8 prowess (detainment; the attack is cancelled if the company contains a character with a home site in Anórien or Ithilien).
Men - 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
they are considered of different race for the purpose of Profitable Trade.
Men — each character faces 1 strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies).
Tap a Man or Dúnadan in a covert company to play a minor item from your discard pile.

card.name: Captain of the Royal Rangers
card.text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Playable only on Faramir at Minas Tirith (or in your starting company). Faramir becomes a leader. +2 EI against characters with a home site in Gondor. While moving to Henneth Annûn no creatures may be keyed to the site against his company. If Faramir is at Henneth Annûn, all agent attacks against his company are cancelled.

card.name: Captain of the Tower Guard
card.text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Playable on Boromir II at Minas Tirith (or in your starting company). Boromir II becomes a leader. +2 EI against characters with a home site in Gondor. +1 to his CC. If Lord Denethor is eliminated, all effects associated with Lord Denethor now apply to Boromir II. Attacks against his company keyed to Anórien by name are detainment.

card.name: Captains of the West
card.text: Command. Playable at Minas Tirith on a manifestation of Aragorn II, Boromir II, Faramir or Imrahil. Your Man andDúnadan warrior characters in the company with a mind of 2 or less do not cost influence to control. You may bring any number of these into play during the organization phase, and there is no limit to the company’s size. Discard this card when there are more than 2 non-Man, non-Dúnadan characters in the company, or when you move outside of Greater Gondor or Mordor. If the bearer of this card leaves active play you may transfer this card to one of the above mentioned characters in the company.

card.name: Cause of the Free Peoples
card.text: Unique. Playable on an untapped diplomat character at the same site as a revealed (non-hazard) agent that cannot use any type of magic. Tap the character and make an influence check against the agent (as if a character in play by opponent). Modify this attempt by +2 if the agent is wounded or tapped, and by -1 for each revealed agent opponent has in play. If the influence check is successful and you have a copy of the agent in your hand, you may play him as an ally worth 1 less mp (to a minimum of 1) under the control of the influencing character. Place this card with the ally.

card.name: Challenge
card.text: Playable during CvCC before strikes are assigned. Choose one of opponent’s characters and one of yours: CvCC now proceeds as if they were single character companies. Additionally, if your company consists of one character and no more than one ally, CvCC is not cancelled as per any site card of the companies involved.If CvCC is cancelled by your opponent, place this card in your mp; it is worth 1 mp.

attr.value: *playable only if you faced a Man attack this turn.
*playable only if you faced a Man attack this turn. An overt company must tap a scout to move to this site.

card.name: Councellors of the North Kingdom
card.text: Unique. Playable if two of the following cards arein play: Master of Buckland, The Thain or The Mayor. Bearers of these cards gain +2 EI against Dúnedain and Dúnadan factions, may use any Palantír they bear, and may tap at any time to take Arthadan Rangers or Rangers at Sarn Ford from your discard pile to your hand. Any Mischief in a Mean Way in play at sites in The Shire is discarded.

card.name: Cult of the Eye
card.text: Playble on a minion Man or Dúnadan faction if Doors of Night is in play. All Border-holds [B] and Free- holds [F] in the region containing the site where the faction was played have an additional automatic- attack: Men — 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against black players’ companies). This attack is cancelled for players that have a faction in such a region. Additionally, all influence attempts by a hero player against the faction are modified by -2.

card.name: Damrod of Ithilien
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Damrod. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play athis home site. Damrod costs only 3 points of influence to control when in the company with Faramir, Anborn or Mablung. -1 to his CC if not in the company with one of these characters.

card.name: Death of a Kinsman
card.text: Unique. Playable after an attack if a characterhas been killed by the attack. tTap all other characters in the company of the same race or with the same home site.

card.name: Derufin
card.text: Unique. If in the same company as Duilin he requires only 2 influence to control.

card.name: Dervorin
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against Dúnedain.

card.name: Dirwood Spear
card.text: Weapon. +1 prowess against Animals, Orcs, Undead and Wolves. Wose only: bearer gains the warrior skill. If bearer already is a warrior, he may always be assigned a strike from an attack (regardless of his status or the attack’s ability).

card.name: Duilin
card.text: Unique. If in the same company as Derufin he requires only 2 influence to control.

card.name: Duinhir
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Men of Lamedon faction. +2 EI against characters with Vale of Erech as their home site.

card.name: Dúnadan Mariner
card.text: +1 prowess when moving through a Coastal Sea region [c] or when at a Port or site in a Coastal Sea region.tap: allow his company to use Port-movement. Discard Great Ship or Black Sails (for no effect) during the organization phase to allow his company to move 3 extra regions, when moving with Port-movement or to a site in a Coastal Sea.

attr.value: (1st) Orcs 4 — strikes with 7 prowess (2nd) Wolves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess
Stolen Knowledge. Were-wolf may always be played keyed to the site. You may place this card with a company leaving the site; discard this card to cancel a Demon or Wolf attack the company faces.
Orcs. Wolves — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against Black player's companies; normal against other player's companies)

If Counterfeit is played on an Orc at this site, target Orc is considered a Scara-hai instead of a Half-orc (invert Counterfeit). Any non- unique wolf ally is playable at this site by a Scara-hai Orc.

card.name: Eithel Ulmo
card.text: Unique. Playable on Pelargir, if you control a Dúnadan faction. For each Coastal Sea [c] in any of your companies’ site path you may place a token on Eithel Ulmo. tap: during your organization phase to look at a number of cards from the top of your play deck equal to the number of tokens on this card and replace them in any order you choose. Afterwards, remove the tokens. Discard Eithel Ulmo if Pelargir is discarded or returned to its loaction deck.

card.name: Elendilmir
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at Tolfalas if you discard a Lost Knowledge card from the company; also playable at Isengard if opponent has a manifestation of Saruman in play and you discard a Stolen Knowledge card. +3 EI against Dúnedain and Men with a home site in Gondor. Dúnadan only: tap: give +2 to a CC made by a Dúnadan character in the same company.

card.name: Elessar
card.text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Aragorn II. +4 EI against Dúnedain and Elves. May tap to use a Palantír he bears. You may play Return of the King and Army of the Dead as if on Aragorn II and take these cards from your sideboard into hand when Elessar enters play.

card.name: Engines of Defense
card.text: Playable as a hero resource on a Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F]. Cancels any attacks created by Siege. Additionally, the prowess of automatic- attacks against overt companies at this site is increased by 2. Alternatively, playable as a minion resource on a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]: Tower Raided cannot be played on the site and the prowess of automatic-attacks against hero companies at the site is increased by 2.

card.name: Envinyatar, the Renewer
card.text: Unique. Elessar specific. Playable on Elessar during the site phase at Umbar, if you have Raid on Umbar in play. You may take Tarma of Ar-pharazôn from your sideboard to your hand. +1 to your handsize. +5 to Elessar’s EI against factions playable at sites in Harnendor, Mordor or the Great Central Plains. Umbar becomes one of your Lord-havens [H]: all attacks against your companies at Umbar are cancelled. If you have Stone of Erech or Tarma of Ar-pharazon in play this card is worth 5 mp and all influence attempts by opponents against factions, characters and allies in Gondor or Harnendor are modified by -5.

card.name: Ernil-i-Pheriannath
card.text: Unique. Playable on Pippin, if To Fealty Sworn is played on him and you have Return of the King or Steward of Gondor in play. +1 to his prowess. He requires only 2 influence to control if controlled by a manifestation of Aragorn II or the Steward of Gondor. When facing an attack you may always assign a strike to Pippin, regardless of the attack’s abilities or his status.Discard if you have neither Return of the King nor Steward of Gondor in play.

card.name: Errand-riders of Gondor
card.text: Dúnedain. 2 strikes. Detainment against hero and covert companies (-2 prowess against hero companies). May also be keyed to any Dúnadan-hold. Unless this attack is cancelled or defeated, any Dúnadan creature may be played on a company that has faced Errand-riders of Gondor; if such a creature is only keyable to regions by name, it may only be played if the company is moving through a region in the same territory as one of the listed regions.

card.name: Escaped Slaves
card.text: Playable at a (tapped) Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] during the same site phase you played Rescue Prisoners if the influence check is greater than 7. The race of this faction is that of your avatar (Man for Wizards).

card.name: Extravagant Tombs
card.text: Playable on an Atani-lord. +2 to his P. His companies must use minion version for all Elf-hold sites and may attack any company with an Elf. Additionally, he cannot play Elf characters and all Elf characters require +1 mind to control. His Elf factions are worth 0 mp in all cases. Cannot be duplicated on a given Atani-lord. Discard when any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: Eyes of the White Tower
card.text: Dúnadan-lord specific. Place this card with yourLord, if he bears a Palantír and is at one of your Lord-havens [[H]. You may return this card to your hand if you so choose during your organization phase. In addition to adopting the given attributes, your Lord’s skills become sage/diplomat and he may not move. +1 to your hand size. Once per turn your Lord may make a CC instead of tapping to use a Palantír he bears. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Fear of Death
card.text: Corruption. Playable on an Atani-lord. The character receives 1 CP (2 if a Dúnadan-lord). Target character makes a CC during the site phase if an Elf is at the same site. During his organization phase, a character with this card may tap to attempt to remove it. Make a roll: if the result is greater than 5, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Feudal Bonds Broken
card.text: Prince Imrahil specific. Playable on Prince Imrahil,if you have 10 P or more, Grace of Uinen, Guild of the Venturers and a faction playable at Pelargir in play. Each of your factions only playable at a Port is worth +1 mp. Additionally, +5 to Prince Imrahil’s EI against Man and Dúnadan factions and characters playable at a Port; when making an influence attempt against such a faction or character in play by an opponent, the mind/number is nullified. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: First among Equals
card.text: Unique. Playable on Aragorn II, if he bears Narsil or a Palantír. +1 to his CC when bearing one of these items. He becomes a leader and receives +2 EI against characters. You may shuffle one command card from your sideboard into your play deck when you play this card. Discard this card if a character in his company is eliminated by a CC.

card.name: First Settlers
card.text: Playable at any tapped or untapped site where you have played Rebuild the Town if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: none. Your opponent chooses this faction’s race: Dúnadan, Dwarf, Elf, Hobbit or Man. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Forbidden Knowledge
card.text: Dúnadan-lord specific. Playable on a Dúnadan sage at one of your Lordhavens [H], if you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card. Target character may use spirit-magic and shadow-magic, and you may play these cards. If on your avatar, +1 to his CC from magic cards. If a character in the company is eliminated, rotate this card 90 (or place a token) and take a magic card from sideboard or discard pile. Target character receives +1 EI against Men and Dúnedain for each time rotated.Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Garrison of Cair Andros
card.text: Unique. Playable at Cair Andros if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+1). tap: cancel the play of Dark Tryst by any opponent.

card.name: Get You Gone
card.text: Diplomat only. Tap a diplomat during the movement/hazard phase to cancel a unique non-agent hazard before it resolves.

card.name: Gift of the Evenstar
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable on Frodo at any Haven [H] or Free-hold [F] where Arwen is present. tap: prevent Frodofrom being discarded or returned to your hand (before any roll is made). Additionally, Sail to the West may be played on Frodo, even if Círdan is not in play or not at Grey Havens (Frodo may keep any non-ring items he bears).

card.name: Golasgil
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against the Men of Anfalas faction.

card.name: Grace of Uinen
card.text: Unique. Elessar or Prince Imrahil specific. Playable on your Lord during the site phase at Tolfalas. Tap your Lord. You may place Hair of Uinen with this card: Linyuilë and Nenselde the Wingild are not discarded as per their card text, when in a company with your Lord and moving to a Port or site in a Coastal Sea [c] region. tap: during your organization phase to take Fair Sailing, Hair of Uinen, or Karma of Aldarion from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Great Elf-warrior
card.text: Unique. Playable on Sam Gamgee, if he bears Sting, Phial of Galadriel or The One Ring and has defeated a strike from an Orc or Spider attack this turn. He receives +3 prowess against Orcs and Spiders.

card.name: Guild of the Venturers
card.text: Unique. Elessar or Prince Imrahil specific. Playable on a company at Pelargir or Linhir. Politics cannot be played on characters in the company. tap: take Leaguer of Pelargir from your discard pile to your hand. If Karma of Aldarion is in the company, invert this card during the site phase at a site in the Northern Waste or The Uttersouth. If inverted this card is worth 3 mp.

card.name: Halbarad of the North
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Halbarad. +1EI against Dúnedain. +1EI against factions playable at his home sites.

card.name: Hands Clasped, Hair Mingling
card.text: Playable on a character of the following pairs: Arwen anda manifestation of Aragorn II, Celebrian and Elrond, Éowyn and Faramir, Galadriel and Celeborn, Gilraen and Arathorn II, Lothiriel and Éomer. Both characters of the chosen pair gain +2 EI useable only against each other. You may at any time wound either one (no body check is required) to prevent the other from leaving active play (unless he/she is eliminated). If both are in the same company, all influence attempts against them fail and their CC are modified by +1. Cannot be duplicated for a given pair.

card.name: Harnendor Contested
card.text: Dúnadan-lord specific. Playable if you have a faction in play at a site in Harnendor. As long as you have more unique factions in play at sites in Harnendor than any opponent, Harondor becomes a Border-land [b] and this card is worth 1 mp for each such faction. Discard this card if any opponent has more factions in play at sites in Harnendor or you have no such faction in play. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Heritage Forsaken
card.text: Playable on a Dúnadan character not moving through a Coastal Sea [c] region. The character is worth -2 character mp (to a minimum of 0). During his movement/hazard phase the character may try to remove this card. Make a roll, adding 3 to the roll if the character taps and 3 for each Coastal Sea [c] in the company’s site path; if the result is grater than 12, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn or a given character.

card.name: Hideous Lust and Rage
card.text: Playable on a manifestation of Gollum. +3 prowess against a strike he faces. Unless wounded by the strike, you may untap him afterwards.

card.name: Hirgon
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Man and Dúnadan factions. If Hirgon is the only character in the company, add +2 to any of his influence attempts.

card.name: Hirluin the Fair
card.text: Unique. May use Black Arrow as if he were a Man character.

card.name: His Fury Has Betrayed Him
card.text: Playable during strike assignement on a non-avatar warrior, if the warrior is chosen to face a strike from a non-detainment creature attack with more than one strike. No strike may be cancelled. The warrior faces the attack as though he were a single character company. Each excess strike gives -1 body to the warrior. Cannot be duplicated on a given attack.

card.name: Hobbit Short-bow
card.text: Hobbit only. Weapon. tap: give -1 to prowess/body of an Animal, Spider, Wolf, Orc or Man attack, and an extra -1 modification for each other Hobbit Short-bow tapped against the same attack. Cannot be duplicated on a Hobbit.

card.name: Hobbits Must Make Haste
card.text: Playable at the end of the movement/hazard phase on a moving company that contains only Hobbits and at least one untapped ally. Tap the ally: the company may move to an additional site this turn.

card.name: Hobbits of the Westmarch
card.text: Unique. Playable at The White Towers if Councellors of the North Kingdom is in play, and the influence check is greater than 8.Standard Modifications: Hobbits (+2), Dúnedain (+2) Red Book of Westmarch may be stored at The White Towers for 3 mp: all versions of The White Towers become a Free-hold [F], the hero version loses all automatic-attacks, replace automatic-attacks for minion versions with: Hobbits — 3 strikes with 6 prowess, Dúnedain — 2 strikes with 10 prowess.

card.name: Húrin the Tall
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against characters and factions playableat Minas Tirith. Atani-lord only: if Captains of the West is in play and Fallen-Saruman is not, you may play Keys of Orthanc and The Fortress of Isen (as if a Fallen-wizard).

card.name: Ingold
card.text: Unique. -1 to his CC. -1 to influence attempts against factions.

card.name: Kin to the Firstborn
card.text: Unique. Prince Imrahil specific. You may playElf characters at any of your Lordhavens if Prince Imrahil is there. If you reveal this card as a starting stage card, such characters may also be in your starting company. All your Elf characters and factions are worth full mp. Additionally, while there is an Elf in his company, Prince Imrahil is also considered an Elf for the purpose of playing resources.

card.name: Kin-strife
card.text: Playable on a company containing only Dúnadan and Man characters. If the company contains any Dúnedain, no Dúnadan characters may join the company. If the company contains any Men, no Man characters may join the company.a p The hazard player may discard this card (counting as 1 against the hazard limit) to tap a Dúnadan or a Man character in the company. Discard if the company contains no Dúnadan or Man characters outside the organization phase, or if a character in the company plays a Man or Dúnadan faction.

card.name: Kingsfoil
card.text: Playable on Aragorn II or Strider bearing Athelas, if a Dúnadan sage is in the same company. Tap Aragorn/Strider and discard Athelas. Remove all corruption cards from wounded characters in the company and heal all wounded characters (from wounded to untapped). If at a site in Anórien, you may take Return of the King from your sideboard to your hand.

card.name: Knight of Dor-en-Ernil
card.text: Prince Imrahil specific. Playable on a warrior Dúnadan character at Dol Amroth (or in your starting company). Character becomes a leader and receives +2 EI against characters with a home site in Andrast, Belfalas, Lamedon or Lebennin. When at a site in these regions, such characters may be brought into play under his EI as if at their home site.Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Last Army of the West
card.text: Unique. Playable if Doors of Night is not in play. Each minion company moving through Anórien, Ithilien, or Dagorlad faces 3 attacks: Men — 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 10 prowess; Eagles — 2 strikes with 12 prowess. If these attacks are defeated, place this card in opponent’s mp. Additionally, any minion company moving through the above mentioned regions may only move 3 regions in all cases (even if with starter movement).

card.name: Leaguer of Pelargir
card.text: Unique. Dúnadan-lord specific. Playable if you control at least 6 characters and/ or factions playable in Gondor. Discard this card if these conditions are not met. Dúnadan and Man creatures with an asterix (*) keyed to a region or site in Gondor always attack as detainment against Dúnadan- lord players (unless the company is overt); these are never detainment against minion companies. Man factions in play by a Dúnadan-lord at sites in Gondor are worth full mp. Additionally Raid on Umbar, Rescue Prisoners and War Preperations are worth full mp. Discard this card if the minion Black Númenóreans comes into play.

card.name: Left on the Field
card.text: Playable on an item (except a unique ring item) that is discarded when a character leaves active play (or is taken prisoner); does not count against the hazard limit. Place this card with the item at a site in the same or adjacent region as the site the former bearer was at or moving to (hazard player’s choice); it may be played by any player at this site. If this card is discarded place it in opponent’s mp instead: it is worth -1 mp. Discard this card if the item is played by any player other than opponent.

card.name: Legacy of the Faithful
card.text: Dúnadan-lord specific. Your Dúnadan characters with a mind of 5 or greater may tap to use a Palantír they bear. Your Dúnadan characters receive +1 to their CC if in the company with an Elf. Discard this card from play (at any time) to modify your P by -3 until the end of the turn, or instead of discarding Favor of the Valar from hand.

card.name: Lieutenant of Barad-dûr
card.text: Unique. Playable on The Mouth. The Mouth becomes a War-lord and a leader. He can use spirit-magic and gains the sage skill. When he is at Barad-dûr (or Dol Guldur if The Necromancer is in play) you may hold one more card than normal in your hand. Mouth of Sauron cannot be played. If Join with that Power is played on an infuence attempt by The Mouth against an opponent’s resource or character, the bonus is doubled.

attr.value: Port. Discard a minor item from a character in the company during the site phase to play a non-unique minor item on that character from your sideboard (even a hoard item). If bearer is a Man or Dúnadan, he may tap and discard a major item to play a non-unique major item instead.
(1st) Men — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies); (2nd) Dúnedain — 2 strikes with 10 prowess(against overt companies only).

card.name: Lord Denethor
card.text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Denethor II. +4 EI against characters with Minas Tirith as a home site. +2 EI against the Tower Guard of Minas Tirith. May tap to use a Palantír he bears. When Lord Denethor is at Minas Tirith you may keep one more card than normal in hand. tap: take Tower of Guard from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Lord of the Nazgûl
card.text: Playable if a manifestation of The Witch-king is in play. Any player may discard (at any time) an event with Unleashed in its title from hand, to target and cancel any effect that would cancel an attack or strike by a Nazgûl or Ringwraith. Discard this card if no manifestation of a Nazgûl is in play.

attr.value: (1st) Men — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies). (2nd) Dúnedain — 2 strikes with 9 prowess (against overt companies only).
Burning Rick, Cot and Tree may be played at this site; if successfully played, all automatic-attacks at sites in Anórien and Lebennin receive -1 prowess and strikes.

card.name: Lothíriel
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Éomer and Imrahil II. tap: give +2 to a CC made by a Man or Dúnadan character in her company.

card.name: Lucky on his Friends
card.text: Elessar specific. One Dwarf, one Elf and one Hobbit character may be in your starting company. Alternatively, you may play a non-overt character of any race with Elessar’s company at one of your Havens [H]. Place this card on such character: +3 to your rolls for influence attempt against him and to return him to your hand.

card.name: Mablung of Ithilien
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Mablung. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at hishome site. Mablung costs only 3 points of influence to control when in the company with Faramir, Anborn or Damrod. -1 to his CC if not in the company with one of these characters.

card.name: Mace of Anárion
card.text: Unique. Playable at Minas Morgul. Weapon. This itemis normally considered a hero item. Discard a stored Dark Forges at a Darkhaven [K] and play Counterfeit on this item (as if a character) to “restore” it: it now becomes a minion item which may only be borne by a Ringwraith (it affects a Ringwraith). Warrior or Ringwraith only: +3 to prowess (to a maximum of 11) and -1 to strike’s body. This item is worth 3 mp to a hero player and/or if restored.

card.name: Master of Buckland
card.text: Unique. Playable on Merry at Brandy Hall or Bywater, if he bears To Fealty Sworn. Tap Merry to cancel an Awakened Plant attack. Alternatively, tap Merry (at any time) to take Fear! Fire! Foes! from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Men of Lossarnach
card.text: Unique. Playable at Lossarnach if the influence check is greater than 7.Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+1), Forlong in the company (+2). tap: bring a food minor item from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle).

card.name: Mordor Storms
card.text: Environment. Black player only. Playable if Skies of Fire is in play. Any effect from non-creature hazard cards that would tap a character in a company at or moving to a site in the following regions is cancelled: Gorgoroth, Imlad Morgul, Nurn, or Udûn. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: No Enemy Dares Contest
card.text: Playable only if Gates of Morning is in play. Anórien, Belfalas, Lamedon, and Lebennin are considered one unified region and Free-domain [f] for all purposes. Hazard creatures with an asterix (*) keyed by name to any one of these regions may be played keyed to this unified region.

card.name: No Longer Allowed to Pass
card.text: Playable on a covert minion company moving to a Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F]. Make a roll (+2 if moving to a Free-hold) and subtract the mind of highest mind character in the company that is untapped. If the result is 5 or greater, the company becomes overt. Discard this card when the company leaves the site. May also be played on-guard and revealed before any automatic-attacks are faced.

card.name: No More Would Come
card.text: Each player must make a roll during his untap phase for each of his tapped factions: if the result is lower than 8, the faction does not untap. Cannot be duplicated. Discard when any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: Oathbreaker
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of The King of the Dead. Playable at a site in Lamedon by a Ringwraith, Fallen Pallando or a manifestation of Aragorn II, if the company has moved with special movement from Dunharrow this turn. Oathbreakers company may move between Rohan and Lamedon as if these were adjacent. Discard Oathbreaker if he is at a site outside of Gondor or Mordor. If Army of the Dead is in play, discard both.

card.name: Oaths You Have Taken
card.text: Playable on a non-avatar character, ally, or factionif Stone of Erech or Tarma of Ar-Pharazôn is in play. -5 to all influence attempts against target and +5 on any rolls to discard target or return him/it to your hand. Any such attempt and/or rolls are not modified by unused GI, mind or faction number. If an influence attempt against target is successful, place target in opponent’s mp along with this card; he/it is considered eliminated and cannot be removed from mp. Cannot be duplicated on a given target.

card.name: Old Drûg
card.text: Playable on a unique Wose character. Character may tap to cancel a Pûkel-creature attack against his company. Additionally, Lure of the Senses and Taint of the Wilds cannot be played on him. Discard this card to take any 2 different minor items with a Wose only ability or only playable on a Wose from your sideboard to your hand.

card.name: On the Precious
card.text: Playable during the site phase on a character bearing a ringspecial item. You may take a manifestation of Gollum fromyour discard pile to your hand. Additionally, if My Precious is face up and at a site in the same or an adjacent region, or the ringbearer is at one of My Precious’ home sites, he now attacks the ringbearer’s company. The ringbearer must face at least 1 strike. If still in play after the attack, My Precious is considered at this site (no site card is needed if none is available).

attr.value: Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-hold [S].

Port on Anduin. Battleground. During the site phase a company may discard (for no effect) a LostKnowledge card the company controls to make Palantír of Osgiliath playable at this site until end of the turn.
Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Border-hold [B].

Port on Anduin. Battle-ground. During the site phase a company may discard (for no effect) a Stolen Knowledge card the company controls to make Palantír of Osgiliath playable at this site until the end of the turn.

card.name: Palantír of Minas Ithil
card.text: Unique. Minion only. Manifestation of The Ithil-stone. Palantír. Playable at Minas Morgul. Unless bearer is a Ringwraith or is at Dol Guldur he must make a body check at the end of the untap phase. tap: duplicate the effect of any Palantír in play, or prevent the discard from play of Bane of the Ithil-stone. This item may only be tapped if it is stored at Dol Guldur. Fate of the Ithil-stone may be played and/or inverted without discarding a Lost or Stolen Knowledge card; it must be inverted at the site where this item is present or stored.

card.name: Politics
card.text: Playable on a character with a mind greater than 4 inthe company of a Fallen-wizard or Lord of the samerace (Man for Fallen-wizard). Target character cannot be controled by GI; if there is not enough EI available to control him, he must leave the avatar’s company after the next organization phase. Discard any Trusted Councellor or Thrall of the Voice played on the character, or Sworn to the Lord played on the avatar. Discard this card if target character is not in the company of an avatar.

card.name: Pride Increased with Despair
card.text: Playable on a non-avatar character with a combined mind and unused EI greater than 5. Target character’s CC are modified by -1 for each ally he controls and for each resource permanent-event with a mp played on him. Cannot be duplicated on a given character. Discard this card if target character successfully transfers a greater or special item to another character in his company.

card.name: Prince Imrahil
card.text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Imrahil. +5 EI against Dúnadan characters with a home site in Anfalas, Belfalas or Lamedon. +2 EI against the Knights of Dol Amroth faction. When Prince Imrahil is at Dol Amroth you may keep one more card than normal in hand. If an opponent has a company without an agent at a non-Haven [H] site in Belfalas during any organization phase, you may look at his hand. tap: take Tower of Amroth from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Putting away All Fear
card.text: Unique. Playable on a company at or moving to asite in a Dark-domain [d]. Discard all corruption cards played on characters in the company. Make a roll for each environment hazard permanent-event or long-event in play; discard each if result is greater than 8. This card and its effects cannot be cancelled.

card.name: Quarters of the Regent
card.text: Dúnadan-lord specific. Playable on a Dúnadan-hold or Free-hold [F] where you have a unique faction in play. This site becomes a Lordhaven [H] for your companies and loses all automatic-attacks against your companies. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled. Other Fallen-avatars may not use this site as a Haven. Discard this card when the site leaves active play, or when you do not have a faction in play at the site.

card.name: Quick as a Snake
card.text: Playable on an attack that chooses defending characters, after strikes are assigned; does not count against the hazard limit. Strikes from this attack cannot be cancelled or made ineffectual.

card.name: Raid on Umbar
card.text: Unique. Playable during the site phase at Umbar, if you discard a Stolen Knowledge card from the company. Discard this card if you do not have more factions in play at sites in Gondor than any opponent has at sites in Hyrmenfalas and its adjacent regions. The company faces 2 attacks (Men — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; Men — 2 strikes with 9 prowess; cannot be cancelled). Afterwards tap a character to place Raid on Umbar in your mp or discard this card. Factions in play at Umbar give 1 less mp (to minimum of 1) and Pirates and Corsairs of Umbar receive -2 prowess.

card.name: Rammas Pelennor
card.text: Playable if you have a faction in play at Minas Tirith. All overt companies moving through Anórien face an attack: Men — 3 strikes with 8 prowess. All automatic-attacks against minion companies at Minas Tirith receive +1 prowess and +1 strike for each faction in play at Minas Tirith. All hero characters receive +2 prowess during CvCC at Minas Tirith. Discard if you have no factions in play at Minas Tirith, or if Smoke on the Wind or People Diminished is played on Minas Tirith. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Ring of Barahir
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable at Rivendell by Elrond, Arwen or a manifestation of Aragorn II, if manifestations of all three of these characters are in play. When you play this item you may bring Choice of Lúthien and Choose a Mortal Life from your sideboard or discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle). tap: cancel a Dragon or Drake creature attack and put the creature’s card back into opponent’s hand. Cannot be stored or stolen.

card.name: Rose Cotton
card.text: Unique. Hobbit. Playable by a Hobbit at Bywater.2 mp if controlled by Sam Gamgee. tap: prevent any effect that would either discard her controlling character or return him to your hand. tap: if controlled by Sam Gamgee to search your playdeck or discard pile for any card that mentions Sam Gamgee in its card text and take it to your hand. Discard Rose Cotton if her company moves to a site not in The Shire.

card.name: Royal Navy
card.text: Unique. Playable at Pelargir if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+1), Steward of Gondor Dúnadan (+2), Return of the King Aragorn (+3). tap: allow one of your companies to move an additional Coastal Sea [c] region. tap: cancel an attack by Corsairs of Umbar against one of your companies.

card.name: Ruffians
card.text: Men. 4 strikes. May also be played keyed to the Shire and Bree. May also be revealed as an on-guard creature at any Border-hold [B], if you tap an agent at the site. Any Pick-pocket played on a company that has faced Ruffians receives +3 prowess (unless Ruffians was cancelled).

card.name: Rumours of Danger
card.text: When you play this card, name a creature type:a scout may tap to let each hazard creature of named type played against his company count as 2 against the hazard limit. Any player may discard 2 hazard creatures of named type at any time to force the discard of this card.

card.name: Rush along Recklessly
card.text: Playable on a moving company at the end of the organization phase. The company’s site path may include up to 2 extra regions. The hazard limit for this company is increased by 1 for every non-ranger character in the company.

attr.value: (1st) Trap — 1 strike with 6 prowess; (2nd)* Pûkel-creature — 1 strike with 8 prowess —cannot be cancelled—
* The second automatic-attack need only be faced if the company intends to play an item.
(1st) Trap — 1 strike with 6 prowess; (2nd)* Pûkel-creature — 1 strike with 8 prowess —cannot be cancelled—
* The second automatic-attack need only be faced if the company intends to play an item.

card.name: Sharp Blade
card.text: Playable on a character bearing a non-minor item weapon facing a strike from a non-Nazgûl, non-Undead attack. The body of the strike is modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated on a given strike.

card.name: Siege of Gondor
card.text: Unique. Playable if Doors of Night is in play. Any hero company moving through Anórien, Ithilien, Imlad Morgul and/or Gorgoroth must face the following attacks: Men — 4 strikes with 7 prowess; Orcs — 4 strikes with 9 prowess; Trolls — 2 strikes with 10 prowess; Animal — 1 strike with 11 prowess. The company may attempt to cancel each attack by making a roll, adding 1 for each scout in the company.If the result is greater than 8, the attack is cancelled. If all 4 attacks are defeated, opponent gains 3 kill mp. Additionally, Anórien is considered a Shadow-land [s] for the purposes of playing hazards other than Undead.

card.name: Son of Adrahil
card.text: Command. Playable on a manifestation of Imrahil. Whenever Imrahil faces a strike you may rotate this card by 90 (or add one counter; maximum of 4). Discard this card to modify one influence attempt by Imrahil, or a CC or roll to remove a hazard by/from a character in his company, by the number of times this card is rotated. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Son of Ecthelion
card.text: Command. Playable on a manifestation of Denethor (at any time), if at or moving to a Shadow-hold [S], Dark-hold [D] or Battleground site. Tap Denethor to untap all Dúnadan characters in his company. If played before strike assignment, you assign all strikes of the attack regardless of the characters’ status or the attack’s abilities. Additionally, Denethor receives +1 prowess and body until the end of the turn.

card.name: Spirit of Mordor
card.text: Playable on a non-unique detainment attack by Men, Orcs, Trolls, or Undead without an asterix (*). May also be played on a detainment (non-grey) agent attack. The attack proceeds as if it were a non- detainment attack.

card.name: Star of Gobha
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at Setmaenen, if the company has moved this turn with special movement from Dunharrow. +3 EI against Woses. Discard Stone of Erech if in play. If bearer is at a site in Lamedon you may designate a faction in Gondor in play by your opponent and place this item with the faction in his mp: the number required to influence this faction is 0. After a successful influence attempt, place the faction and this item in your mp instead of discarding it; it is considered eliminated and cannot be influenced or discarded; opponent’s handsize is modified by -1.

card.name: Steward of Gondor
card.text: Unique. Playable on Denethor II, Boromir II or Faramir, if Return of the King and Elessar are not in play. This card must always be transferred to the first character in line in active play according to the above mentioned order (or discarded if he is in play by opponent). Discard this card if bearer is ever at a site outside of Greater Gondor, or if Return of the King is in play and this card is not on Faramir. +1 to prowess (to a maximum of 6), +1 body (to a maximum of 8), +2 mind, +2 EI against Dúnedain. According to bearer: Denethor II gains the ability to use a Palantír; Boromir II gains the ranger skill; Faramir gains the sage skill.

card.name: Stone Mace
card.text: Weapon. Two-handed. May also be played ata Wose-hold. May not be a starting minor item, unless your starting company includes a Wose character. +1 prowess (to a maximum of 8) Wose only: +1 prowess against Dwarves, Orcs and Trolls.

card.name: Stories of the Elder Days
card.text: Lore. Playable on your Elf-lord, Dúnadan-lord or Wizard. Tap your avatar to take Gift of Comprehension, Lore of the Ages or Tales of the Hunt from your discard pile to your hand. These may be played on characters in your avatar’s company regardless of their race and give 1 less CP (if in your avatar’s company). Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Swan of Amroth
card.text: Unique. Prince Imrahil specific. Place this card on Prince Imrahil if he is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Prince Imrahil) to take Great Ship, Guild of the Venturers or a command card from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Taint of Ambition
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-avatar diplomat. Target character receives 1 CP and makes a CC when a resource card requiring the diplomat skill is played on a character in the company or at the site. During the organization phase at his home site or a Haven [H] (or site that acts as a Haven for healing purposes) the character may tap to attempt to remove this card and make a roll: if the result is greater than 6, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Taint of Deep Lore
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-avatar sage. Target character receives 1 CP and makes a CC when a resource card requiring the sage skill is played on a character in the company or at the site. During the organization phase at his home site or a Haven [H] (or site that acts as a Haven for healing purposes) the character may tap to attempt to remove this card and make a roll: if the result is greater than 6, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Taint of Glory
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-avatar warrior. Target character receives 1 CP and makes a CC whena resource card requiring the warrior skill is played on a character in the company or at the site. During the organization phase at his home site or a Haven [H] (or site that acts as a Haven for healing purposes) the character may tap to attempt to remove this card and make a roll: if the result is greater than 6, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

attr.value: *A Dúnadan sage must tap at this site to make Information playable. A scout at this site may tap to force the discard of any one creature playable at Coastal Seas [C]] ] c] from opponent's hand (he must reveal his hand if none are available).
A scout at this site may tap to force the discard of any one non-unique Dúnadan creature or creature playable at Coastal Sea [c] from opponent's hand (he must reveal his hand if none are available).

card.name: The Black Captain
card.text: Unique. Playable if a manifestation of Witch-king of Angmar and Doors of Night are in play. Nazgûl creatures may beplayed keyed to Imlad Morgul, Ithilien and Anórien, and to sites in these regions (except Henneth Annûn). Witch-king of Angmar may attack from his permanent-event state, counting as one against the hazard limit. If he is not defeated after such an attack he is returned to his controlling player’s hand. Discard this card at the end of any turn if Doors of Night and the Witch-king of Angmar are not in active play, or if The Witch-king is in play but not at a site in the above named regions.

card.name: The Dwimorberg
card.text: Shadow-magic. Playable during the organization phase on a shadow-magic user at Dunharrow. The company must move with special movement to a site in Lamedon this turn: only Undead and hazard creatures keyed to the site may be played on the company, but any Undead creatures may be played. Tap all allies controlled by characters with a mind less than 6; discard any allies without body. At the beginning of the movement/hazard phase the company faces 2 attacks: Undead — each character faces 1 strike with 9 prowess. Undead — 2 strikes with 12 prowess. Each character wounded is eliminated. Each Undead attack may be cancelled by discarding a shadow-magic card from hand. Unless he is a Ringwraith your shadow-magic user makes a CC at -4.

card.name: The End of His Labours
card.text: Unique. Playable on one of your non-avatar characters in active play, if you have a resource in play giving you 4 or more miscellaneous mp. May not be played by a Fallen-wizard. Make a roll and add the current mp difference between you and your opponent. If the modified result is greater than character’s mind plus 7, you may place this card together with target character in your mp. Target character cannot be brought back into active play or the target of any hazard effects.

card.name: The Great Battle of Our Time
card.graphics: The Great Battle of Our Time.jpg
card.text: Each player may remove any number of non-avatar characters from his discard pile and shuffle them into his play deck. A Fallen-wizard or Lord player may remove any number of stage cards without mp value instead from his discard pile and shuffle them into his play deck.

card.name: The Gwaedhel-spear
card.text: Unique. Playable at a site in Lamedon if the company has moved with special movement from Dunharrow this turn. Weapon. Two-handed. +2 prowess (+4 against Undead). Values in parentheses apply when The Gwaedhel-sword is in the company. May only be used by a hero character if Banishment is played on it (as if a Ruins & Lairs). tap: cancel an Undead attack.Grey or black player only: tap: discard Oaths You Have Taken from a character or ally at the same site.

card.name: The Gwaedhel-sword
card.text: Unique. Playable at Vamag. Weapon. +2 prowess (+4 against Undead).Values in parentheses apply when The Gwaedhel-spear is in the company. May only be used by a hero character if Banishment is played on it (as if a Ruins & Lairs). Grey or black player only: tap: play Endless Whispers on a character bearer has defeated in CvCC. White player only: tap: discard a dark enchantment played on (an entity in) the company.

card.name: The Hour Is Come
card.text: For each Palantír a player has in active play he must play with one card from hand revealed (play the card on the table; it is still considered in hand). If a card revealed this way is played or discarded, it is immediately replaced by the top card from the play deck. Discard when any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: The House of Mardil
card.text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Place this card on Lord Denethor when he is in play. You may not play Sapling of the White Tree or the The White Tree (discard either if you have them in play). tap: during the end-of-turn phase to take one I Know Much About You, Interrogation, Tidings of Death, or a command card from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: The Mayor
card.text: Unique. Playable on Sam Gamgee at Bag End or Michel Delving, if he bears To Fealty Sworn. Discard this card if Will Whitfoot is in play. Tap Sam Gamgee to cancel the effects of a hazard event played on a Hobbit in his company. Alternatively, tap Sam Gamgee to take Wit or The Riddle Game from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: The Muster of Gondor
card.text: All detainment attacks keyed by name or type to Rohan, Anórien, Lebennin or Belfalas or sites in these regions receive +2 prowess and cannot be cancelled. Additionally, Lost in Free-domains cannot be played against hero companies moving through these regions. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Ring Goes to Gondor
card.text: Unique. Playable on The One RIng, if borne by a manifestation of Aragorn II, Boromir II, Denethor II, or Faramir while at a sitein Gondor, if you have Steward of Gondor in play. Discard this card if these conditions are not met. +1 to all bearer’s CC. All Dúnadan and Man creatures with an asterix (*) keyed to a region or site in Gondor against a minion company receive +1 prowess and strikes. Every site in Gondor at which a Dúnadan or Man hero faction is in play becomes a Free-hold [F]; the region which contains such a site becomes a Free-domain [f]. Rotate this card 90° (or place a token) during your end-of-turn phase: it is worth 2 mp for each time rotated (to a maximum of 8p). p).

card.name: The Seaward Tower
card.text: Unique. Playable on Dol Amroth, if you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card from the company. If you have a company at Dol Amroth, at the beginning of the movement/hazard phase opponent must reveal any creature card playable on a hero company moving to or at sites in Anfalas, Belfalas or Bay of Belfalas. Only revealed creatures may be played on such company this turn. Additionally, you may tap a faction you have in play at sites in these regions to cancel such a creature attack.Discard this card if Dol Amroth leaves active play.

card.name: The Shirriffs
card.text: Hobbits. 6 strikes. Detainment against hero and covert companies. May be played keyed to the Shire and to Brandy Hall. May also be played on-guard and revealed as an (additional) automatic-attack at any site in the Shire.

card.name: The Thain
card.text: Unique. Playable on Pippin at Tuckburrow or Sackville, if he bears To Featly Sworn. Tap Pippin to cancel Pilfer Anything Unwatched before it resolves. Alternatively, tap Pippin (at any time) to take The Shirriffs from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: The Wind Is Turning
card.text: Environment. Playable on a non-overt company. Discard one environment hazard long-event or permanent-event in play. Alternatively, make a roll: if the result is greater than 6, discard any one hazard permanent-event not played on a characteror company. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: This We Will Take
card.text: Playable on a characters during CvCC, if you have a non-ring item (or manifestation thereof) in hand, which a character in opponent’s company bears. Each character makes a roll (+2 if character if an avatar) and adds the number of characters in his company. If your result exceeds your opponent’s, you may immidiately play the item; opponent must discard his version.

card.name: Thorongil
card.text: Unique. Agent. Manifestation of Aragorn II. Agent only: +2 prowess against Ringwraiths. May move to a Darkhaven [K]. May take 2 agent actions each turn. tap: for an extra strike. tap: attack a company moving to his site during the movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Too Much to Ask
card.text: Playable on a non-unique ally. Wound the ally (no body check is required), or discard the ally if he is already wounded.

card.name: Tower of Amroth
card.text: Unique. Prince Imrahil specific. Playable on Dol Amroth. The site becomes a protected Lord- haven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled. Agents who do not have Dol Amroth as a home site may not move to the site. Discard this card when the site leaves active play or if Smoke on the Wind or People Diminished is successfully played on/at the site.

card.name: Tower of Ecthelion
card.text: Unique. Playable on Minas Tirith if you have Return of the King or Steward of Gondor in play. Minas Tirith untaps (if tapped) during the end-of-turn phase, if a character at the site has used Palantír of Minas Tirith the same turn. You receive this card’s mp if you have Tower Guard of Minas Tirith and The White Tree in play. Discard this card if Minas Tirith leaves active play, or if Smoke on the Wind is played on the site.

card.name: Tower of Guard
card.text: Elessar or Lord Denethor specific. Playable on Minas Tirith. The site becomes one of your protected Lord-havens [H]. If one of your companies is at Minas Tirith, all attacks against it are cancelled. You may bring any number of characters with Minas Tirith as a home site into play if your Lord is there. Agents who do not have Minas Tirith as a home site may not move to the site. Discard this card when the site leaves active play or if Smoke on the Wind or People Diminished is successfully played on/at the site. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Town Guard
card.text: Playable on a covert company at or moving to a Free-hold [F] or Border-hold [B], if a non- animal, non-Ent faction of the same alignment is in play at the site. Cancel an attack keyed to the site or give the attack -3 prowess (your choice). May also be played during opponent’s site phase to cancel CvCC if the same conditions are met.

card.name: Truesight of Númenor
card.text: Dúnadan-lord specific. Playable on your Lord. When bearing a Palantír: +1 to his CC and opponent must discard face up. Whenever you see your opponent discard a non- unique creature that is keyable to your Lord’s current site or the region containing that site, you may discard Favor of the Valar from hand to either remove that creature from the game or have it attack your Lord’s company. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Venomous Sting
card.text: Playable on a character wounded by an attackby Spiders, Bees or Morgai Flies this turn. Does not count against the hazard limit. Disease. Target character receives -1 to prowess and body, and his company may move 1 less region (to a minimum of 2). Discard this card when the character is healed. If played on an Elf, discard this card at the end of the next movement/hazard phase.

card.name: War Preparations
card.text: Stolen Knowledge. Scout only. Playable on an untapped scout at any tapped or untapped Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] in Mordor, after facing all automatic-attacks. Tap the scout. May be stored at a Haven [H] for 2 mp. You may discard a stored War Preparations to take a faction playable at a site in Gondor from your discard pile or sideboard to your hand. Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: Watchers at the Gate
card.text: Playable on a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. The site gains an additional automatic- attack: Pûkel-men — 2 strikes with 9 prowess. Cannot be duplicated on a given site. Discard if the attack is defeated or when the site leaves active play.

card.name: Weary and Asleep
card.text: Playable on a moving hero company. Place 1 counter on this card if the company moves to a non-Haven [H] site; delete 1 counter from it if the company moves to a Haven [H] or Shadow-hold [S]; delete 2 counters if the company moves to a Dark-hold [D]; delete an additional counter if the company moves to an Under-deep site. At the end of each movement/hazard phase, tap 1 character for ech counter on this card. For each food item in the company (to a maximum of 3) you may ignore the effect of 1 counter. Discard this card if there are no counters on it.

card.name: Weary of War
card.text: Every non-Ringwraith character in a company that has initiated CvCC must make a CC modified by -2 during the end-of-turn phase.

card.name: Will Whitfoot
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Hobbits. Unless he is among the starting characters he may only be brought into play at his home site. Is considered a sage for the purpose of playing rituals. If Mathom Lore is played on him he may use any item as if a sage.

card.name: Wizard's Pupil
card.text: Unique. Playable on Faramir, if in the company with Gandalf or if you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card he controls. Faramir gains the sage skill. +1 to his mind. +2 EI against non-warrior characters. +2 to his CC when bearing a ring item.

card.name: Wose Ambush
card.text: Woses. Each character in the company faces a strike. +3 prowess against Orcs. May be played keyed to any Wose-hold. May also be played keyed to Andrast, Lamedon, Old Pûkel Gap or any region containing a Wose-hold, and to Border-holds [B], Ruins & Lairs [R] and Shadow-holds [S] in these regions. Any body check resulting from the attack is modified by +2. May not be played if opponent has a Wose faction in play or a Wose character in the company. Cannot be duplicated on a given movement/ hazard phase.

card.name: Wose Blowpipe
card.text: Wose only. tap: consider a successful non- detainment strike from a non-Nazgûl/ Ringwraith, non-Undead attack against a character in the company defeated (all effects of the successful strike still apply). Make a roll to determine if the strike’s body is also defeated; if the strike has no body value, the roll must be higher than 4.

card.name: Wose Burial Site
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a Wose using region movement with the last one being a non-Coastal Sea [c] region containing a Wose-hold (or an adjacent region). This card is used as a site card: Ruins & Lairs [R] (automatic-attack: Pûkel-creature — 1 strike with 7 prowess. Playable: Items (minor), card draw: 1/1.) A ranger at this site may tap to play Healing Herbs from your hand, discard pile or sideboard even if the site is tapped. The hazard limit is reduced by 2 to a minimum of 2 for a company moving to this site. The company may only leave the site using region movement. Discard Wose Burial Site when the company moves to a new site.

card.name: Wose Elite Hunter
card.text: +3 prowess against Orcs. May only be revealed as a starting character if the company already includes a Wose character with a higher mind. tap: allow his company to move with region movement as if two non-Shadow-land [s], non-Dark-domain [d] regions seprated by a mountain range were adjacent (at least 1 region must contain a Wose-hold).

card.name: Wose Shamanist Potion
card.text: Playable only on a company containing a Wose character, or after successful play of a Wose faction or rune item. Discard this item to defeat all strikes against bearer keyed to Wilderness [w] or Ruins & Lairs [R] for the rest of the turn. Bearer makes a body check modified by -1 (wound if he fails, eliminate if already wounded).

card.name: You've Come Back Changed
card.text: Playable during the organisation phase on a Hobbit at Bree. Tap the Hobbit during the site phase at a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] to tap this card. This card remains tapped until the Hobbit taps during the site phase at Bree to invert this card. Once inverted this card is worth 2 mp and the Hobbit receives +1 prowess (+3 against Men or agents). Cannot be duplicated on a given Hobbit.
